post:
I'm looking for a few community members to test out a few KVM servers, just do whatever you would normally do. set up a game server or something if you are so inclined.

Specs.

2048 MB memory

100 GB Disk Space

1 ipv4 address

KVM/SolusVM

250GB bandwidth (only limited due to being free)

***FREE***

We are working on the finishing touches such as setting up all the templates and expect to have them done in a day or two. If you would like to provide some feedback you have to be a regular in the community; 10+ posts and latest 2 weeks active. The server will be free till the 20th of this month.

Send me a DM with your email and i'll get you set up if you meet the requirements and all i want is the feedback in return.

Thanks
